20101228040039.000|20101228040040.000|CC1|>> 14.                          
20101228040040.000|20101228040042.000|CC1|>> A SEX OFFENDER GIVES WAY TO  
20101228040042.000|20101228040044.000|CC1|HIS URGES.                      
20101228040044.000|20101228040046.000|CC1|>> IT WAS FOUND WITH PICTURES OF
20101228040046.000|20101228040047.000|CC1|CHILDREN FROM MAGAZINES TO      
20101228040047.000|20101228040047.000|CC1|NEWSPAPERS.                     
20101228040047.000|20101228040048.000|CC1|>> JUST LIKE THAT.              
20101228040048.000|20101228040051.000|CC1|>> OKAY.                        
20101228040051.000|20101228040053.000|CC1|>> A NIGHTMARE ASSAULT ON STAFF 
20101228040053.000|20101228040055.000|CC1|CHANGES OVERNIGHT.              
20101228040055.000|20101228040058.000|CC1|>> PROBABLY THE MOST HORRIFYING 
20101228040058.000|20101228040100.000|CC1|SCREAM I HAD HEARD IN MY LIFE.  
20101228040100.000|20101228040101.000|CC1|>> I KNEW HIS INTENTION TO RAPE 
20101228040101.000|20101228040102.000|CC1|AND KILL ME.                    
20101228040102.000|20101228040104.000|CC1|>> ANOTHER INMATE RESTRICTED BY 
20101228040104.000|20101228040107.000|CC1|PRISON POLICY AND BY HIS MIND.  
20101228040107.000|20101228040111.000|CC1|>> I FACE MY LABELS OUT AND THE 
20101228040111.000|20101228040114.000|CC1|HATE STEPPING ON THE CRACKS.    
20101228040114.000|20101228040116.000|CC1|I HAVE BEEN HOARDING SINCE I WAS
20101228040116.000|20101228040150.000|CC1|A KID.                          
20101228040150.000|20101228040153.000|CC1|>> IT'S BEEN SAID A PRISON IS   
20101228040153.000|20101228040155.000|CC1|LIKE ANY OTHER LIVING ORGANISM  
20101228040155.000|20101228040157.000|CC1|THE THE SURVIVAL DEPENS ON THE  
20101228040157.000|20101228040200.000|CC1|ABILITY TO ADAPT TO CHANGING    
20101228040200.000|20101228040200.000|CC1|CONDITIONS.                     
20101228040200.000|20101228040202.000|CC1|ON THE FLAT WIND SWEPT LANDSCAPE
20101228040202.000|20101228040204.000|CC1|OF EASTERN COLORADO IS NO       
20101228040204.000|20101228040205.000|CC1|EXCEPTION.                      
20101228040205.000|20101228040207.000|CC1|>> THE DYNAMICS OF THE          
20101228040207.000|20101228040210.000|CC1|POPULATION WERE MORE VIOLENT AND
20101228040210.000|20101228040212.000|CC1|MORE GANG INCIDENTS.            
20101228040212.000|20101228040216.000|CC1|WE HAD BEGUN COM.               
20101228040216.000|20101228040216.000|CC1|>>MENTAL LIZ AND RESTRICT THE   
20101228040216.000|20101228040219.000|CC1|MOVEMENT.                       
20101228040219.000|20101228040224.000|CC1|>> WHEN TRAVIS TOOK CHARGE OF   
20101228040224.000|20101228040227.000|CC1|LIMIT ON, HE OVERAWE A PRISON   
20101228040227.000|20101228040229.000|CC1|PLAGUED BY VIOLENCE.            
20101228040229.000|20101228040230.000|CC1|THE RESTRICTIONS OF MOVEMENT    
20101228040230.000|20101228040232.000|CC1|WERE AMONG THE TOUGHEST.        
20101228040232.000|20101228040234.000|CC1|INMATES FROM THE SIX HOUSING    
20101228040234.000|20101228040236.000|CC1|UNITS COULD NO LONGER FREELY    
20101228040236.000|20101228040238.000|CC1|MOVE THROUGHOUT PRISON.         
20101228040238.000|20101228040239.000|CC1|VIRTUALLY ALL INTERACTION WOULD 
20101228040239.000|20101228040241.000|CC1|ONLY WITH WITH THOSE IN THEIR   
20101228040241.000|20101228040242.000|CC1|OWN UNITS.                      
20101228040242.000|20101228040244.000|CC1|>> WE IDENTIFIED THE NEED TO    
20101228040244.000|20101228040245.000|CC1|HAVE BETTER CONTROL AND         
20101228040245.000|20101228040247.000|CC1|ISOLATING THE UNITS AND         
20101228040247.000|20101228040248.000|CC1|RESTRICTING THE INTERACTION WITH
20101228040248.000|20101228040250.000|CC1|EACH OTHER IN THE COURTYARD AND 
20101228040250.000|20101228040252.000|CC1|IN RECREATION AND DINING HALLS. 
20101228040252.000|20101228040254.000|CC1|WE ISOLATED TO WHERE ONLY ONE   
20101228040254.000|20101228040300.000|CC1|UNIT CAN ACCESS AT A TIME.      
20101228040300.000|20101228040303.000|CC1|>> WHEN YOU SEPARATE DOGS LIKE  
20101228040303.000|20101228040304.000|CC1|THAT, THEY BARK.                
20101228040304.000|20101228040307.000|CC1|IF YOU GOT THEM ALL TOGETHER,   
20101228040307.000|20101228040308.000|CC1|NOBODY KNOWS THEIR PLACE.       
20101228040308.000|20101228040310.000|CC1|THEY DON'T GET OUT OF LINE.     
20101228040310.000|20101228040311.000|CC1|JUST LIKE THE DOG WHISPERER.    
20101228040311.000|20101228040314.000|CC1|IT'S TRUE.                      
20101228040314.000|20101228040316.000|CC1|YOU KEEP US ALL SEPARATE LIKE   
20101228040316.000|20101228040317.000|CC1|THAT, PEOPLE ACROSS THE YARD    
20101228040317.000|20101228040318.000|CC1|BARK AT THESE PEOPLE BECAUSE    
20101228040318.000|20101228040319.000|CC1|THEY KNOW THEY CAN'T GET TO     
20101228040319.000|20101228040322.000|CC1|THEM.                           
20101228040322.000|20101228040323.000|CC1|THAT'S NOT WHAT PRISON IS       
20101228040323.000|20101228040324.000|CC1|SUPPOSED TO BE RUN.             
20101228040324.000|20101228040326.000|CC1|>> THE WARDEN KNOWS PRIOR TO THE
20101228040326.000|20101228040328.000|CC1|NEW POLICIES, VIOLENCE WAS TOO  
20101228040328.000|20101228040332.000|CC1|MUCH A WAY OF LIFE AT LIMON.    
20101228040332.000|20101228040334.000|CC1|>> WITHIN THE LAST EIGHT YEARS, 
20101228040334.000|20101228040337.000|CC1|WE HAD A STAFF MEMBER RAPE AND  
20101228040337.000|20101228040340.000|CC1|WE HAD A STAFF MEMBER MURDERED  
20101228040340.000|20101228040342.000|CC1|AND A SERIOUS ASSAULT.          
20101228040342.000|20101228040344.000|CC1|THE OFFENDER'S INTENTION WAS TO 
20101228040344.000|20101228040348.000|CC1|RAPE AND MURDER HER.            
20101228040348.000|20101228040352.000|CC1|>> SHE BEGAN WORKING AT LIMON IN
20101228040352.000|20101228040354.000|CC1|1998, THE SAME YEAR SHE MARRIED 
20101228040354.000|20101228040356.000|CC1|HER HUSBAND, THE CASE MANAGEMENT
20101228040356.000|20101228040357.000|CC1|SUPERVISOR.                     
20101228040357.000|20101228040401.000|CC1|>> WE MET IN 1994 AND GOT       
20101228040401.000|20101228040404.000|CC1|MARRIED IN MAY OF 1998.         
20101228040404.000|20101228040405.000|CC1|PAM WORKS IN THE GARMENT        
20101228040405.000|20101228040406.000|CC1|FACTORY.                        
20101228040406.000|20101228040411.000|CC1|HE IS ON THE OTHER SIDE OF THE  
20101228040411.000|20101228040415.000|CC1|FACILITY FROM WHERE I'M AT.     
20101228040415.000|20101228040415.000|CC1|WE WILL HAVE A LUNCH BREAK      
20101228040415.000|20101228040416.000|CC1|TOGETHER.                       
20101228040416.000|20101228040419.000|CC1|>> ON SEPTEMBER 12, 2007, BOB   
20101228040419.000|20101228040422.000|CC1|HAD TO ATTEND A MEETING 100     
20101228040422.000|20101228040423.000|CC1|MILES FROM THE PRISON.          
20101228040423.000|20101228040425.000|CC1|>> WE WERE GOING TO SHUT DOWN AT
20101228040425.000|20101228040427.000|CC1|3:30 AND I HAD MY PAPERWORK AND 
20101228040427.000|20101228040429.000|CC1|I THOUGHT I WOULD RUN ON OVER   
20101228040429.000|20101228040431.000|CC1|HERE AND GET READY FOR THE NEXT 
20101228040431.000|20101228040432.000|CC1|DAY.                            
20101228040432.000|20101228040434.000|CC1|>> AS SHE MADE HER WAY THROUGH  
20101228040434.000|20101228040436.000|CC1|THE NEARLY EMPTY FACTORY, A     
20101228040436.000|20101228040439.000|CC1|SHIPPING CLERK APPEARED AT THE  
20101228040439.000|20101228040439.000|CC1|DOOR.                           
20101228040439.000|20101228040441.000|CC1|>> HE WAS AN INMATE THAT        
20101228040441.000|20101228040442.000|CC1|EVERYBODY TRUSTED.              
20101228040442.000|20101228040444.000|CC1|I KNOW YOU SHOULDN'T TRUST ANY  
20101228040444.000|20101228040446.000|CC1|OF THEM, BUT YOU HAVE TO TRUST  
20101228040446.000|20101228040447.000|CC1|THEM TO A CERTAIN POINT BECAUSE 
20101228040447.000|20101228040449.000|CC1|YOU WORK WITH THEM EVERY DAY.   
20101228040449.000|20101228040451.000|CC1|>> THE INMATE SAID HE NEEDED TO 
20101228040451.000|20101228040453.000|CC1|GET SOMEBODY FROM ONE OF THE    
20101228040453.000|20101228040454.000|CC1|SEWING STATIONS.                
20101228040454.000|20101228040455.000|CC1|>> THIS IS A MACHINE AND I      
20101228040455.000|20101228040457.000|CC1|REACHED DOWN AND OPENED THE     
20101228040457.000|20101228040459.000|CC1|DRAWER LIKE THIS AND HE WAS     
20101228040459.000|20101228040502.000|CC1|STANDING LIKE RIGHT WHERE YOU   
20101228040502.000|20101228040502.000|CC1|ARE.                            
20101228040502.000|20101228040504.000|CC1|HE CAME RIGHT BEHIND ME AND     
20101228040504.000|20101228040506.000|CC1|GRABBED MY WRISTS WITH HIS RIGHT
20101228040506.000|20101228040510.000|CC1|HAND AND SHOWED ME THE UTILITY  
20101228040510.000|20101228040512.000|CC1|KNIFE WITH HIS LEFT HAND.       
20101228040512.000|20101228040514.000|CC1|>> THE SCREAMING WE THOUGHT WAS 
20101228040514.000|20101228040518.000|CC1|A FAN BELT WHINING OR ON A CAR. 
20101228040518.000|20101228040520.000|CC1|IT'S SCREAKY AND LOUD.          
20101228040520.000|20101228040522.000|CC1|>> INMATE GARY STEVENS WAS      
20101228040522.000|20101228040524.000|CC1|WORKING IN ANOTHER PART OF THE  
20101228040524.000|20101228040525.000|CC1|FACTORY.                        
20101228040525.000|20101228040526.000|CC1|>> PROBABLY THE MOST HORRIFYING 
20101228040526.000|20101228040529.000|CC1|SCREAM I HAVE HEARD IN MY LIFE. 
20101228040529.000|20101228040530.000|CC1|SOMETHING I WILL NEVER EVER     
20101228040530.000|20101228040531.000|CC1|FORGET.                         
20101228040531.000|20101228040533.000|CC1|>> HE STARTED PULLING ME OVER TO
20101228040533.000|20101228040536.000|CC1|THE CLOSET.                     
20101228040536.000|20101228040538.000|CC1|HE GRABBED MY CROTCH AND AT THAT
20101228040538.000|20101228040541.000|CC1|POINT I KNEW HIS INTENTION TO   
20101228040541.000|20101228040543.000|CC1|RAPE ME AND KILL ME.            
20101228040543.000|20101228040545.000|CC1|AT THAT POINT I DIDN'T KNOW HIS 
20101228040545.000|20101228040546.000|CC1|ORIGINAL CRIME.                 
20101228040546.000|20101228040548.000|CC1|>> THE INMATE WAS CONVICTED OF  
20101228040548.000|20101228040551.000|CC1|RAPING AND KILLING A 71-YEAR-OLD
20101228040551.000|20101228040551.000|CC1|WOMAN.                          
20101228040551.000|20101228040552.000|CC1|>> AS FAR AS KEEPING HIM FROM   
20101228040552.000|20101228040554.000|CC1|PULLING ME IN THAT CLOSET, IT   
20101228040554.000|20101228040555.000|CC1|MIGHT HAVE BEEN ADRENALINE.     
20101228040555.000|20101228040558.000|CC1|I'M NOT GOING TO DIE TODAY.     
20101228040558.000|20101228040601.000|CC1|>> I WAS TERRIFIED, BUT I WAS   
20101228040601.000|20101228040604.000|CC1|ALSO AT A LOSS OF SHOULD I GO IN
20101228040604.000|20101228040607.000|CC1|AND HELP OR SHOULD I NOT?       
20101228040607.000|20101228040608.000|CC1|>> SOMEHOW HE GOT DISTRACTED    
20101228040608.000|20101228040610.000|CC1|FROM THE INMATES I SAW UP THERE 
20101228040610.000|20101228040612.000|CC1|AND I REACHED FOR MY MIKE AND   
20101228040612.000|20101228040615.000|CC1|SCREAMED FOR HELP.              
20101228040615.000|20101228040618.000|CC1|>> MY HEART TOLD ME TO HELP, BUT
20101228040618.000|20101228040621.000|CC1|MY MIND TOLD ME THINK OF THE    
20101228040621.000|20101228040622.000|CC1|REPERCUSSIONS.                  
20101228040622.000|20101228040623.000|CC1|I HAVE TO LIVE HERE FOR THE NEXT
20101228040623.000|20101228040627.000|CC1|20 YEARS.                       
20101228040627.000|20101228040630.000|CC1|SOME INMATES WOULD HAVE THOUGHT 
20101228040630.000|20101228040631.000|CC1|IT WAS SOMETHING THAT WAS NONE  
20101228040631.000|20101228040632.000|CC1|OF MY BUSINESS.                 
20101228040632.000|20101228040635.000|CC1|>> THE CREEKAL STAFF RESPONDED  
20101228040635.000|20101228040636.000|CC1|IMMEDIATELY TO THE DISTRESS CAL.
20101228040636.000|20101228040639.000|CC1|BILL NELSON WAS THAT DAY'S SHIFT
20101228040639.000|20101228040640.000|CC1|LEADER AND ONE OF THE FIRST ON  
20101228040640.000|20101228040641.000|CC1|THE SCENE.                      
20101228040641.000|20101228040643.000|CC1|>> I CAN SEE THAT THE INMATE HAS
20101228040643.000|20101228040644.000|CC1|A BOX CUTTER.                   
20101228040644.000|20101228040646.000|CC1|PAM IS PLEADING WITH HIM NOT TO 
20101228040646.000|20101228040647.000|CC1|HURT HER.                       
20101228040647.000|20101228040650.000|CC1|I TRIED TO OPEN UP ON THE       
20101228040650.000|20101228040651.000|CC1|CONVERSATION WITH WHAT'S GOING  
20101228040651.000|20101228040652.000|CC1|ON.                             
20101228040652.000|20101228040652.000|CC1|LET HER GO.                     
20101228040652.000|20101228040653.000|CC1|WE CAN WORK IT OUT.             
20101228040653.000|20101228040656.000|CC1|HE YELLS GET OUT OR I WILL KILL 
20101228040656.000|20101228040656.000|CC1|HER.                            
20101228040656.000|20101228040658.000|CC1|>> I HEARD HIM SAY LET HER GO,  
20101228040658.000|20101228040700.000|CC1|TAKE ME.                        
20101228040700.000|20101228040701.000|CC1|>> PAM IS STILL PLEADING, PLEASE
20101228040701.000|20101228040704.000|CC1|DON'T HURT ME AND SHE'S CRYING. 
20101228040704.000|20101228040705.000|CC1|I SAID HEY, I WILL TRADE WITH   
20101228040705.000|20101228040705.000|CC1|YOU.                            
20101228040705.000|20101228040708.000|CC1|YOU CAN HAVE ME.                
20101228040708.000|20101228040711.000|CC1|>> HE HAD THE UTILITY KNIFE.    
20101228040711.000|20101228040713.000|CC1|I FELT IT SCRATCH MY CHEEK.     
20101228040713.000|20101228040716.000|CC1|>> HERE MADE A CUTTING MOTION   
20101228040716.000|20101228040716.000|CC1|WITH THE BLADE.                 
20101228040716.000|20101228040720.000|CC1|UNDERNEATH HER LEFT EAR TO HER  
20101228040720.000|20101228040722.000|CC1|RIGHT EAR.                      
20101228040722.000|20101228040724.000|CC1|I SAW THE WOUND AND THE BLOOD   
20101228040724.000|20101228040725.000|CC1|AND HE PUSHED HER.              
20101228040725.000|20101228040729.000|CC1|HE CUT HER, THE WHOLE WORLD     
20101228040729.000|20101228040731.000|CC1|EXPLODED IN THE DOORS BEHIND US.
20101228040731.000|20101228040734.000|CC1|>> OFFICERS SWARMED THE INMATE. 
20101228040734.000|20101228040736.000|CC1|WITHIN SECONDS, SHE WAS RUSHED  
20101228040736.000|20101228040737.000|CC1|TO SAFETY AND THE INMATE SECURED
20101228040737.000|20101228040741.000|CC1|TO A TRANSPORT IN A STRAIGHT    
20101228040741.000|20101228040742.000|CC1|CHAIR.                          
20101228040742.000|20101228040744.000|CC1|>> IN A SHORT TIME LATER, I SAW 
20101228040744.000|20101228040747.000|CC1|HIM BRING PAM OUT ON THE        
20101228040747.000|20101228040750.000|CC1|SKETCHER AND I COULD SEE BLOOD  
20101228040750.000|20101228040759.000|CC1|RUNNING DOWN HER NECK.          
20101228040759.000|20101228040801.000|CC1|>> BOB WAS DRIVING HOME FROM HIS
20101228040801.000|20101228040802.000|CC1|OUT OF TOWN MEETING WHEN HE GOT 
20101228040802.000|20101228040804.000|CC1|THE NEWS.                       
20101228040804.000|20101228040805.000|CC1|>> IT WAS APPROXIMATELY 50 MILES
20101228040805.000|20101228040807.000|CC1|FROM LIMON.                     
20101228040807.000|20101228040810.000|CC1|I GOT A PHONE CALL FROM PAM AND 
20101228040810.000|20101228040812.000|CC1|SHE SAID DON'T WORRY.           
20101228040812.000|20101228040813.000|CC1|IT'S ME.                        
20101228040813.000|20101228040822.000|CC1|THEY ARE FLYING ME TO DENVER.   
20101228040822.000|20101228040828.000|CC1|IT STILL GETS TO ME.            
20101228040828.000|20101228040831.000|CC1|THE WHAT IF, HE MISSED HER      
20101228040831.000|20101228040833.000|CC1|JUGULAR BY 1/8 OF AN INCH.      
20101228040833.000|20101228040836.000|CC1|WITHIN TWO MINUTES SHE WOULD    
20101228040836.000|20101228040836.000|CC1|HAVE BEEN DEAD.                 
20101228040836.000|20101228040839.000|CC1|>> THE ATTACKER, ALAN THOMAS,   
20101228040839.000|20101228040841.000|CC1|WAS CONVICTED OF ATTEMPTED      
20101228040841.000|20101228040842.000|CC1|SECOND-DEGREE MURDER.           
20101228040842.000|20101228040844.000|CC1|HE RECEIVED A 24-YEAR SENTENCE  
20101228040844.000|20101228040846.000|CC1|ON TOP OF THE LIFE HE WAS       
20101228040846.000|20101228040848.000|CC1|ALREADY SERVING AND TRANSFERRED 
20101228040848.000|20101228040850.000|CC1|TO ANOTHER STATE PRISON.        
20101228040850.000|20101228040853.000|CC1|AT THE TIME OF THE ATTACK,      
20101228040853.000|20101228040854.000|CC1|TRAVIS WAS THE ASSOCIATE WARDEN 
20101228040854.000|20101228040856.000|CC1|AND MONTHS AWAY FROM ASSUMING   
20101228040856.000|20101228040858.000|CC1|LEADERSHIP OF THE PRISON.       
20101228040858.000|20101228040900.000|CC1|>> YOU WANT TO BE METHODICAL    
20101228040900.000|20101228040902.000|CC1|ABOUT IT AND NOT MAKE A DRASTIC 
20101228040902.000|20101228040904.000|CC1|CHANGE TO UPSET THE STAFF AND   
20101228040904.000|20101228040906.000|CC1|UPSET THE OFFENDERS.            
20101228040906.000|20101228040908.000|CC1|WHEN THIS INCIDENT HAPPENED, WE 
20101228040908.000|20101228040908.000|CC1|LITERALLY CHANGED THE OPERATIONS
20101228040908.000|20101228040911.000|CC1|OVERNIGHT.                      
20101228040911.000|20101228040913.000|CC1|>> COMING UP --                 
20101228040913.000|20101228040915.000|CC1|>> I FEEL SORRY FOR THE LADY.   
20101228040915.000|20101228040916.000|CC1|IT SUCKS, YOU KNOW?             
20101228040916.000|20101228040918.000|CC1|THEY HAVE TAKEN AWAY EVERYTHING 
20101228040918.000|20101228040920.000|CC1|FROM US BECAUSE OF THAT.        
20101228040920.000|20101228040921.000|CC1|>> AN INMATE STRIKES BACK.      
20101228040921.000|20101228040926.000|CC1|>> A FEW STEPS FORWARD AND      
20101228040926.000|20101228041053.000|CC1|PUTTING LIKE A BASEBALL PITCH.  
20101228041053.000|20101228041241.000|SEG_01|Type=Commercial
20101228041053.000|20101228041053.000|CC1|522 BUCKS -- THAT'S WHAT        
20101228041053.000|20101228041056.000|CC1|PEOPLE SAVE, ON AVERAGE,        
20101228041056.000|20101228041056.000|CC1|  WHEN THEY CALL ME

20101228045832.000|20101228045834.000|CC1|THE PRISON HAS LOOSENED THE
